title: Pheno4D: A spatio-temporal dataset of maize and tomato plant point ...
summary: This paper introduces Pheno4D, a spatio-temporal dataset of maize and tomato plant point clouds. It discusses the challenges of processing high-density point clouds and the usage of larger spatial context.
usefulness_reason: This article is relevant because it presents a 'spatio-temporal dataset' and discusses 'point cloud processing', which relates to 'point process' and 'contextual dataset' in a broader sense. While not directly about spatio-temporal point processes, it covers related concepts.
